CustomProperties.Name: IsCreditCard

ScopeVariableInfo.Description: The text value to evaluate for a credit card pattern

CustomProperties.Tooltip: Indicates whether a string follows a valid credit card pattern

CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to toggle the primary color.

CustomProperties.Tooltip: The sequence of characters to be used to check if a string contains the specified search pattern.

Rules.InvariantScript: If('Credit Card validation'.ClearIcon = true, If('Credit Card validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Disabled || 'Credit Card validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.View, false, If('Credit Card validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Edit && IsBlank(TextInput1_12.Text), false, true)), false)

If('Credit Card validation'.ClearIcon = true, If('Credit Card validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Disabled || 'Credit Card validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.View, false, If('Credit Card validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Edit && IsBlank(TextInput1_12.Text), false, true)), false)

If('Credit Card validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Disabled, DisplayMode.Disabled, If('Credit Card validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Edit && IsBlank(TextInput1_12.Text), DisplayMode.Disabled, DisplayMode.Edit))

If('Credit Card validation'.ValidateOnChange = true, 'Credit Card validation'.IsCreditCard(CCNumberTxt) = false && !(IsBlank(CCNumberTxt)),'Credit Card validation'.IsCreditCard(TextInput1_12.Text) = false && !(IsBlank(TextInput1_12.Text)))
